summary: A Taiwanese high school baseball team travels to Japan in 1931 to compete in a national tournament.
cast: Togo Igawa|Masatoshi Nagase|Takao Osawa|Tenma Shibuya|Yu-Ning Tsao|Ken Aoki|Tender Huang|Hsing-Chen Yeh|Bamboo Chu-Sheng Chen|Yukihiko Kageyama|Maki Sakai|Judy Hsu|Rose Yu|Pei-Ann Lin|Sam Chang|Sonrei Yoshioka|Man-Chiao Wang|Kotaro Yamamuro|You-Fan Tsai|Yun-Sheng Hsieh|On-Shun Yau|Bing-Hong Cheng|Yan-Cheng Chong|Hong-Yi Chang|Chin-Hong Chen|Chi-An Wei|Yun-Hao Chou|Yuma Okura|Fion Sun|Yun-Chieh Hsieh|Yong-Xin Chen
title: Kano
